0.18.name: wordpress/statpress-widgets
0.18.description:
Display search engines and referrer statics on you're sidebar.

Referrer Widget Features: Top and last referrers, hosts filter, display counts.

New in the 0.29 Version: Search Engines Widget Features: Top Search Engines, optionaly show counts, Top search terms, terms filter.

<br/> The widgets are completle setable. Next versions will contain widgets for browsers, spiders, countries an so on.

This Plugin uses the Database data from the Statpress plugin.
